channel.title: Instant Ice (Hot Ice)
channel.description:
Alright well this is how to make Hot Ice or Instant Ice im not sure what to call it because basically you boil water add some stuff then take the water put it in a glass and refrigerate it for a while... anyways here is the video
http://my.break.com/media/view.aspx?ContentID=307412
if im not aloud to link it directly to that site then ill just download it and upload it somewhere else.. as far as i know this isnt agaisnt the rules to post lol.
